dynRDFa

Class VelociDataModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • dynRDFa.VelociDataModel

  • public class VelociDataModel
extends java.lang.Object
    The VelociDataModel class serves as the go-between for application and template. It creates initializes a VelocityEngine and loads the template. It also creates a context object which is most easily viewed as a simple map that stores objects by key. More specifically, the context stores objects of type java.lang.Object, keyed by objects of typejava.lang.String. In essence, the dynamic portion of a template's content is specified through the keys used to look up that content in the context. The $ prefix in the template simply lets the template engine know that the following text potentially corresponds to a context key that requires special processing. The html documents are produced by invoking the merge method of the template object.
    Author:
    magda

    • Method Detail

      • vdmInitializer

        public void vdmInitializer()
        The non-Singleton model is used. An instance of VelocityEngine has been created, and now its init() method is invoked.

      • builder

        public void builder(ExportableModel exportableModel)
        Retrieves the template, creates and populates the context, generates the right type of html document and merges template and context. As a result the template is rendered in the document.
        Parameters:
        exportableModel - is the object that holds all the necessary information that will populate the model.
